cards.desc: When I am summoned, if there is an opposing enemy face-up persistent trap, destroy it.

cards.name: Mario
cards.desc: After I attack if possible I relocate to the field on the right, else if possible - to the left.

cards.name: Re-trap
cards.desc: Activate when another friendly trap leaves play. Set it back on its last occupied trap-field.

cards.name: com g3 1
cards.desc: Combines with G3

cards.name: com g3 1
cards.desc: Combines with G3

cards.name: grand copycat
cards.desc: When I am summoned, if there is an opposing face-up enemy creature, I gain power equal to its current power plus 1.

cards.name: No-Flippers!
cards.desc: Activate me when an opposing enemy creature's combat-flip effect is triggered.Negate that effect.

cards.name: Mana-Drain
cards.desc: Activate when opposing enemy creature is summoned manually. The enemy's mana is depleted instantly.

cards.name: Eject
cards.desc: When an enemy creature enters the opposing field for any reason, return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: reflipper2
cards.desc: IN-GRAVEWhile I am the top card in your graveyard, at the end of every player's turn force-activate the safe-flip effects of all their face-up creatures in play.

cards.name: swapper3
cards.desc: I can relocate to an occupied creature field on your side, by swapping places with the creature there. This does not count as relocation for the other creature.

cards.name: gcontract swap
cards.desc: IN-GRAVEWhile I am the top card in your grave, all of your creatures can be manually relocated to occupied creature fields as well as empty, by swapping places with the creature there. This does not count as relocation for the other creature.

cards.name: Ultimatum
cards.desc: Activate at the start of the enemy's turn, if there are both a friendly and an enemy creature on this colum. At the end of the enemy's turn, if that is still the case, they swap places, else if there is only a friendly creature, destoy it.

cards.name: megasweeper
cards.desc: At the end of your turn destroy all creatures in play with power higher than %%0.

cards.name: Mega-Trap
cards.desc: Activate during the enemy turn the moment there is an opposing enemy creature with power higher than %%0. Destroy it instantly.

cards.name: Blood-Haggler II
cards.desc: Combat-FlipStun opposing creature until the end of the turn.Take %%0 direct damage and return me to your hand.

cards.name: Time-Reverser
cards.desc: Combat-Flip:Add the top card in your graveyard to the top of your deck.

cards.name: angered2
cards.desc: My power is raised by %%0 while there is an opposing face-down creature.

cards.name: summon2move
cards.desc: Activate when the opposing enemy creature field is empty and an enemy creature is summoned to a different field. Move it to the opposing field.

cards.name: draw deckstruction
cards.desc: Activate at the start of the enemy's turn. Until the end of their turn, for every card they draw, they discard %%0 cards from the top of their deck.

cards.name: empower III
cards.desc: Activate at the begiinning of the enemy's turn, if there is a friendly face-up creature on this column. Raise its power by %%0 every time an enemy creature attacks until the end of your own turn.

cards.name: super empower
cards.desc: Activate at the begiinning of the enemy's turn, if there is a friendly face-up creature on this column. Raise its power by %%0 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: empower2
cards.desc: Activate at the begiinning of the enemy's turn, if there is a friendly face-up creature on this column. Raise its power by %%0 every time an enemy creature attacks. Destroy at the end of the turn.

cards.name: spynet
cards.desc: Activate at the beginning of the enemy turn. Until the end of their turn, every time they set a new trap or summon a creature face-down, they must show you what it is first.

cards.name: deckstructor2
cards.desc: Combat-Flip:Enemy discards %%0 cards from their deck.

cards.name: yqfu19
cards.desc: When I am summoned, I perform a free attack.???

cards.name: bomb9
cards.desc: Destroy me at the end of the enemy turn.When I die, if possible, destroy the opposing enemy creature and all adjacent friendly creatures in play.

cards.name: deckstructor0
cards.desc: When I am summoned, both players discard the top card from their decks.

cards.name: foe linkee2
cards.desc: While I am in play, when an enemy creature is summoned, life-link me to it, unless I am already life-linked to a creature.

cards.name: charger
cards.desc: My power is raised by 1 every time I am relocated.

cards.name: linker
cards.desc: When I am summoned, if there are friendly creatures adjacent to me, life-link me to them, else - destroy me.

cards.name: t1fys8
cards.desc: Activate when an opposing enemy creature begins an attack and there is a face-up flippable friendly creature with a combat-flip effect on the same column. Flip your creature face-down.

cards.name: kw55ly
cards.desc: Activate when an opposing enemy creature is summoned and there is a face-up flippable friendly creature with a safe-flip effect on the same column. Flip your creature face-down.

cards.name: crippler
cards.desc: Safe-Flip:If possible, decrease opposing enemy creature's power by 5.

cards.name: doubleattacker
cards.desc: After I finish an attack, if I am still in play I automatically perform another attack.

cards.name: directo1
cards.desc: At the end of the enemy turn, if there is an opposing enemy creature, deal 1 direct damage  to them.

cards.name: binaro
cards.desc: My power equals 2 to the power of your current mana amount.

cards.name: rock
cards.desc: My power equals the current power of my tribute at the moment of its death.
